## BaseWidget.styling() method

Override this method to returns an object that defines the class names for the different parts of the widget. The returned object conforms to the [IWidgetClassNames](./teamsfx-react.iwidgetclassnames.md) interface which defines the possible keys and values for the class names.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected styling(): IWidgetClassNames;
```
**Returns:**

[IWidgetClassNames](./teamsfx-react.iwidgetclassnames.md)

An object that defines the class names for the different parts of the widget.
